post:
MasterVM.com is officially opening for business! Well, sort of! :)

While we're still chugging away on the whole flashy website thing, we're ready to host, and the best part of it is you get 50% off either of our current VPS plans, monthly or quarterly paid, for your first 6 months of service!

MV 128
4.50 euros/month, 10 euros/quarter before promo
1 core
128MB RAM/256MB burst
10GB hard drive space
100GB monthly bandwidth

MV 256
6.50 euros/month, 17.00 euros/quarter before promo
2 cores
256MB RAM/512MB burst
20GB hard drive space
200GB monthly bandwidth

Both are OpenVZ

Currently located only in Germany with G-Portal. Tests: 176.57.191.2 ; http://mastervm.com/100MB.test

Promo codes: TAKEITOFF for 50% off for 6 months, monthly paid. TAKEITOFF3 for 50% off for 6 months, quarterly paid. Valid until May 20, or 10 uses each.

Instant activation and 7 day money back guarantee.
Support is available in English, Finnish, and Swedish Monday-Friday, 8am - 4pm Finnish time (EEST), and whenever possible outside those hours. Our support staff are located in Austin, Texas, USA (English) and Vaasa, Finland (English, Finnish, Swedish).
IRC "community support" and discussion on Quakenet (irc.quakenet.org) #MasterVMcom

Signup: http://mastervm.com/billing/cart.php
